section.title: Importing Asset Tags for a Virtual Machine from a CSV File

procedure.title: To Import Asset Tags for a Virtual Machine from a CSV File

step.para: Make sure the CSV file is in the required format.
Click on the Settings accordion, then Region, then click on the Import tab.
Select the type of custom variable you want to import, either Host or VM.
Click Browse to go to the location where the custom variable file is located.

note.para: If there are any problems with the file, such as an incorrect column name, unknown virtual machine or host, a message appears.
